Private Member Functions

 DISALLOW_COPY_AND_ASSIGN (SpannableStringBuilder)

Detailed Description

This is the class for text whose content and markup can both be changed. 

 TextWidget tv = new TextWidget(staic_cast<Page*>this);
 SpannableStringBuilder ssb("SpannableStringBuilder Text");
 ssb.setSpan(new AlignmentSpan(AlignmentSpan::ALIGN_CENTER));
 ssb.setSpan(new ForegroundColorSpan(Color::BLUE), 0, ssb.length(), 0);
 ssb.setSpan(new BackgroundColorSpan(Color::RED), 0, ssb.length(), 0);
 ssb.setSpan(new BulletSpan(BulletSpan::STANDARD_GAP_WIDTH, Color::GREEN), 0, ssb.length(), 0);
 ssb.setSpan(new RelativeSizeSpan(1.6f), 0, ssb.length(), 0);
 ssb.setSpan(new StrikethroughSpan(), 0, ssb.length(), 0);
 ssb.setSpan(new StyleSpan(3), 0, ssb.length(), 0);
 ssb.setSpan(new SubscriptSpan(), 0, ssb.length(), 0);
 ssb.setSpan(new SuperscriptSpan(), 0, ssb.length(), 0);
 ssb.setSpan(new TypefaceSpan("monospace"), 0, ssb.length(), 0);
 ssb.setSpan(new UnderlineSpan(), 0, ssb.length(), 0);
 ssb.setSpan(new URLSpan("www.google.com"), 0, ssb.length(), 0);
 tv->setText(ssb);

Definition at line 39 of file SpannableStringBuilder.h.

void gaia::text::SpannableStringBuilder::clear ( ) [virtual]

Convenience for replace(0, length(), "", 0, 0)

See also:
replace(size_t, size_t, CharSequence*, size_t, size_t) Note that this clears the text, not the spans; use clearSpans if you need that.

Implements gaia::text::Editable.

int32_t  limit 
) [virtual]

Editable* gaia::text::SpannableStringBuilder::replace ( size_t  start,
size_t  end,
CharSequence *  tb,
size_t  tbstart,
size_t  tbend 
) [virtual]

Replaces the specified range (. 

 st ... en

) of text in this Editable with a copy of the slice 

 start ... end

from 

 source

. The destination slice may be empty, in which case the operation is an insertion, or the source slice may be empty, in which case the operation is a deletion.

Before the change is committed, each filter that was set with setFilters is given the opportunity to modify the 

 source

text.

If 

 source

is Spanned, the spans from it are preserved into the Editable. Existing spans within the Editable that entirely cover the replaced range are retained, but any that were strictly within the range that was replaced are removed. As a special case, the cursor position is preserved even when the entire range where it is located is replaced.

Returns:
a reference to this object.

Implements gaia::text::Editable.

void gaia::text::SpannableStringBuilder::setSpan ( ObjectStyle *  what,
size_t  start,
size_t  end,
int32_t  flags 
) [virtual]

Mark the specified range of text with the specified object.

The flags determine how the span will behave when text is inserted at the start or end of the span's range.

Implements gaia::text::Spannable.
